snapAlign.description: The snap alignment of the item.

autoplayStatusChange.description: Function called when the autoplay status changes.

dragStatusChange.description: Function called when the drag status changes.

pageChange.description: Function called when the page changes.

update:page.description: The callback fired when the carousel page changes.

slideCount.description:
The total number of slides.
Useful for SSR to render the initial ating the snap points.

allowMouseDrag.description: Whether to allow scrolling via dragging with mouse

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.

autoplay.description: Whether to scroll automatically. The default delay is 4000ms.

defaultPage.description:
The initial page to scroll to when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the page of the carousel.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  item(index: number): string
  itemGroup: string
  nextTrigger: string
  prevTrigger: string
  indicatorGroup: string
  indicator(index: number): string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the carousel. Useful for composition.

inViewThreshold.description: The threshold for determining if an item is in view.

loop.description: Whether the carousel should loop around.

padding.description:
Defines the extra space added around the scrollable area,
enabling nearby items to remain partially in view.

page.description: The controlled page of the carousel.

slidesPerMove.description:
The number of slides to scroll at a time.

When set to `auto`, the number of slides to scroll is determined by the
`slidesPerPage` property.

slidesPerPage.description: The number of slides to show at a time.

snapType.description: The snap type of the item.

spacing.description: The amount of space between items.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
